title: Firework Fountain
info: The Firework Fountain is a placed novelty mechanism that, when activated, produces one of four colorful "sparkle fountain" effects. Once placed, the Fountain can be activated via wire, or by right-clicking the Fountain directly. Its effect is purely visual, causes no damage, and can be used infinitely at no cost. It is purchased from the Party Girl for 3.
